titles.title: Expressing sympathy to and pledging the support of the House of Representatives and the people of the United States for the victims of Cyclone Sidr in southern Bangladesh.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Mr. Meeks (NY) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 842.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 388 - 0 (Roll no. 1142).

bill.summary: 12/11/2007--Passed House amended. Expresses sympathy for the victims of Cyclone Sidr which has affected southern Bangladesh. Urges the U.S. government to make available all appropriate assistance requested by the Bangladeshi authorities. Reaffirms the House of Representatives' commitment to provide relief aid as the cyclone's effects continue to unfold.
